component.name: Haruna Video Player
component.summary: A Qt/QML video player built on top of libmpv.

description.p: A Qt/QML video player built on top of libmpv.
Added loop action (l key); first trigger sets loop start, second sets loop end, third clears the loop.
The loop section is highlighted in the progress bar.
Added actions to change subtitle size (ctrl+z and ctrl+x) and subtitle position (r and shift+r).
Add action (s key) to take screenshots.
Screenshots are saved in a `screenshots` folder in the same folder as the video file.
Add audio tracks cycle up (Shift+3) and down (Shift+2) actions.
Add subtitle tracks cycle up (j) and down (Shift+j) actions.
Video title is now used as window title.
Fix volume not being remembered between sessions.
Fix volume slider background being the same as the footer background.
Fix playlist not being able to scroll sometimes.
Fix quit keyboard shortcut sometimes having to be triggered twice to work.
Fix changing audio track from meniu.
